Key Match Events: Jonny Bairstow scored 30 runs off 31 balls
Dawid Malan scored 28 runs off 25 balls
Ben Stokes scored 43 runs off 73 balls
Jos Buttler scored 8 runs off 6 balls
Moeen Ali scored 15 runs off 15 balls
David Willey did not get out
Sri Lanka won by 8 wickets with 146 balls remaining
Pathum Nissanka scored 77 runs off 83 balls
Kusal Perera scored 4 runs off 5 balls
Kusal Mendis scored 11 runs off 12 balls
Sadeera Samarawickrama scored 65 runs off 54 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Lahiru Kumara was named Man of the Match and MVP, taking 3 wickets for 35 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: England elected to bat first after winning the toss
Sri Lanka won the match by 8 wickets
The match was played at M Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru
